files.summary: Manages creation of affiliate/affiliation agreements for scheduling. Binds directors, sponsor names, and participating institutions from session/department context. Uses DataTableToJSON for client-side rendering.
files.businessPurpose: Creates and manages affiliate agreements between institutions for clinical rotation scheduling
keyMethods: Page_Load - Initializes affiliate agreement form with director and institution data
BindDirectors - Populates director dropdown from department data
BindSponcerName - Populates sponsor institution dropdown
BindParticipatingName - Populates participating institution dropdown
DataTableToJSONWithJSONNet - Serializes data to JSON for client-side rendering

files.summary: Handles campus/site creation for scheduling. Uses PreceptorManager to manage campus data with cohort binding via DataView.
files.businessPurpose: Allows administrators to add clinical campuses/sites used in rotation scheduling
keyMethods: Page_Load - Initializes campus creation form with cohort data

files.summary: Creates schedule templates for rotation scheduling. Binds campus names and serializes data to JSON for client-side template construction using PreceptorManager.
files.businessPurpose: Allows creation of schedule templates that define rotation patterns and campus assignments
keyMethods: Page_Load - Initializes schedule template form
BindCampusNames - Populates campus dropdown from PreceptorManager
DataTableToJSONWithJSONNet - Serializes data for client-side rendering

files.summary: Manages user assignment to schedules. Binds user types, groups, specialties, campuses, years, and affiliations for comprehensive user scheduling configuration. Uses UserManager and PreceptorManager.
files.businessPurpose: Assigns users (residents/faculty) to rotation schedules with specialty, campus, and year filtering
keyMethods: Page_Load - Initializes user assignment form with multiple dropdown bindings
BindUserTypes - Populates user type dropdown
BindGroups - Populates group dropdown
BindSpecialityTypes - Populates specialty dropdown
BindCampus - Populates campus dropdown
BindYears - Populates academic year dropdown
BindAffiliation - Populates affiliation dropdown by department
GetCalenderYears - Generates academic year list

files.summary: Displays affiliate agreement reports. Uses UserManager to set up user context for report generation.
files.businessPurpose: Generates reports on affiliate agreements between institutions
keyMethods: Page_Load - Initializes affiliate agreement report with user context

files.summary: Edits scheduling settings including time slots, activities, and configuration. Populates time slot dropdowns at 15-minute intervals and binds department activities by category using PreceptorManager.
files.businessPurpose: Configures schedule settings such as time slots, activity types, and department-specific scheduling parameters
keyMethods: Page_Load - Initializes settings form with time slots and activities
PopulateTimeSlots - Generates time slot options at configurable intervals
DataTableToJSONWithJSONNet - Serializes settings data for client rendering

files.summary: Global schedule settings page for department-level scheduling configuration. Checks permissions for schedule management access and uses DepartmentManager and EvaluationTemplateBusiness for settings management.
files.businessPurpose: Provides department-level scheduling configuration for administrators and program directors
keyMethods: Page_Load - Initializes schedule settings with permission check
CheckForPermissions - Validates schedule management access based on isEnableScheduleManagement flag

files.summary: Comprehensive scheduling settings page. Binds years, campuses, sites, PGY levels, and department default days. Uses PreceptorManager and PreceptorModuleManager for site and scheduling data with ViewState-based page state management.
files.businessPurpose: Configures comprehensive scheduling settings including campuses, sites, PGY levels, and default schedule parameters
keyMethods: Page_Load - Initializes comprehensive settings form
BindYears - Populates academic year dropdown
BindCampus - Populates campus dropdown
BindSites - Populates clinical sites from PreceptorModuleManager
BindPGYList - Populates PGY training level dropdown
SetDepartmentDefaultDays - Configures default scheduling days for department
GetPGYCategoryTable - Builds DataTable of PGY categories
GetCalenderYears - Generates academic year list

directoryOverview: Rotation/clinical scheduling module (MySchedule) for managing clinical rotation schedules, campuses, affiliate agreements, and scheduling settings. Supports creating schedule templates, assigning users to rotations, managing campus/site configurations, and department-level scheduling parameters. Uses PreceptorManager as the primary business layer for scheduling operations.
keyWorkflows: Create and manage clinical rotation schedule templates with campus assignments
Add and configure campuses and clinical sites for rotation scheduling
Assign users (residents/faculty) to schedules with specialty and year filtering
Manage affiliate agreements between institutions for rotation placements
Configure department-level scheduling settings (time slots, PGY levels, default days)
